name: Negronis Recipe (for a Crowd)
description: For a stress-free bash, I recommend making bottled cocktails in advance. This recipe makes a killer Negroni that will stun and delight millions of people! Okay, maybe just eight people.
recipeIngredient: 5 1/2 ounces sweet vermouth (I like Carpano Antica, but that's hard to find in many places)
6 ounces bottled water (something neutral, not mineral water)

recipeInstructions.text: Using a funnel, pour all ingredients into a bottle. Close the bottle and chill until service.
